details: Restructured GitHub Advanced Security (GHAS) documentation into a new "how-tos/secure-at-scale" section for enterprise and organization-level configurations.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Restructured GitHub Advanced Security (GHAS) documentation into a new "how-tos/secure-at-scale" section for enterprise and organization-level configurations.
- Moved enterprise security guides (e.g., enabling GHAS, configuring scanning tools) to `/code-security/how-tos/secure-at-scale/configure-enterprise-security/`.
- Reorganized organization security guides under `/code-security/how-tos/secure-at-scale/configure-organization-security/`.
- Added troubleshooting guides and tutorials for managing security at scale.
- Updated redirects and frontmatter across files to reflect new paths.

### Title
Restructure GHAS documentation for scalability and clarity
